mapper.select: SELECT c1.code1, c2.code2, c1.title AS tit1, c2.title AS tit2 FROM `km_category1` AS c1 JOIN `km_category2` AS c2 ON c1.code1 = c2.code1 ORDER BY c1.code1, c2.code2;
SELECT *, Floor(price * (1 - discount / 100)) AS salePrice FROM `km_products` ORDER BY `hit` DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT *, Floor(price * (1 - discount / 100)) AS salePrice FROM `km_products` ORDER BY `sold` DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT *, Floor(price * (1 - discount / 100)) AS salePrice FROM `km_products` ORDER BY `score` DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT *, Floor(price * (1 - discount / 100)) AS salePrice FROM `km_products` ORDER BY `rdate` DESC LIMIT 8;
SELECT *, Floor(price * (1 - discount / 100)) AS salePrice FROM `km_products` ORDER BY `discount` DESC LIMIT 8;
